sentences.sContent: Seeing those old school photographs has made me feel quite nostalgic.
sentences.sCn: 看到那些学生时代的旧照片，我不禁产生了怀旧之情。

sentences.sContent: a nostalgic look back at the 1950s

remMethod.val: nost(回家) + alg(痛) + ic → 想回家想到心痛 → 思乡的

trans.tranOther: if you feel nostalgic about a time in the past, you feel happy when you remember it, and in some ways you wish that things had not changed
